sections.heading: the Revised Code shall be known as the transparency in private attorney contracts act.
sections.text: the Revised Code shall be known as the transparency in private attorney contracts act.

sections.heading: the Revised Code do not apply to contingency fee contracts and renewals thereof that are in existence on  the effective date of this section.
sections.text: the Revised Code do not apply to contingency fee contracts and renewals thereof that are in existence on the effective date of this section.

sections.heading: to which this section applies shall bear interest at not to exceed the maximum or maximum average annual interest rate per annum determined in or pursuant to the proceedings for the securities by the legislative authority, taxing authority, subdivision, governing body, officer, or other issuer, boar
sections.text: to which this section applies shall bear interest at not to exceed the maximum or maximum average annual interest rate per annum determined in or pursuant to the proceedings for the securities by the legislative authority, taxing authority, subdivision, governing body, officer, or other issuer, board, authority, commission, district, agency, body, or entity that is the issuer, or governing body or officer of the issuer, of those securities.
